channel.title: R Package on KevCaz Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in R Package on KevCaz Home Page

item.title: Something wrong with rgeos 0.4-1?
item.description: The last update of rgeos (version 0.4-1) was released on October 19th, 2018 and with my current R set up: R> sessionInfo() R version 3.5.1 (2018-07-02) Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu (64-bit) Running under: Debian GNU/Linux buster/sid I got the following error: checking geos_c.h presence and usability... yes checking geos: linking with libgeos_c... no /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgeos collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status configure: Install failure: compilation and/or linkage problems. configure: error: initGEOS_r not found in libgeos_c.
